# [Interview #1170: Shadows of Self - Lansing, MI, Entry #10](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1170#10)

#### Blaze1616

Who would win a game of Tarachin, Hoid or Lightsong?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Hoid. Even if he had to cheat.

#### Question

I thought so.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Plus, Lightsong wouldn't really care.
